channel.title: Runserver.bat problem
channel.description:
hey guys, been a while.
starting the private server stuff back up again. anyways, the runserver.bat i have for the latest rich scape doesnt work for me. i have jdk 6 update 7 the runserver sais
[code]@echo off title Richscape cd Source/Bin java server pause[/code]
and i get this:
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...[/code]
i tried putting the path to my java.exe and javac.exe but i just get its not recognized as an internal or external command errors... what am i dooing wrong?

item.title: Runserver.bat problem
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

@echo off title Richscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Try it ant tell me if something goes wrong

Read full topic
